FAQ

What audio formats are supported?

Input: MP3, WAV, OGG, M4A, FLAC, AAC, Opus, and WebM audio. Output: MP3, WAV, OGG, M4A, FLAC, AAC, and Opus.

Is my audio file uploaded to a server?

No. All conversion happens entirely in your browser using Web Audio API and FFmpeg.wasm. Your files never leave your device.

What quality settings are available?

High quality uses higher bitrates for better sound quality but larger file sizes. Medium is a good balance. Low uses lower bitrates for smaller files.
